title: Can Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond be sent to the Graveyard by its own effect?
question: Can Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond be sent to the Graveyard by its own effect?
llm_answer: No, Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond cannot be sent to the Graveyard by its own effect. Its effect requires it to be sent to the Graveyard as a cost to activate, but it cannot be used if it would result in the card being sent to the Graveyard by its own effect.
